description:
Part A: Isobe has a kind wife, a lovely little daughter, and a perfect home life, but he still felt like something was missing. One day, he runs into Moguro and realizes that he wants a life with a little more intensity...
 
Part B: The head of a mommy friend group named Oniyo complains about every little thing she finds displeasing. Shizuoka Nozomi is a part of the group, and just like the others, never argues with her. One day, Nozomi meets Moguro, and he brings back a series of peaceful days for her, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Baketa Otoko / Mama Tomo no Okite
Der verwandelte Mann / Die Regeln der Mütter-Riege
La métamorphose – Le clan des mamans
The Man Who Transformed / The Rule of Mommy Friends
化けた男 / ママ友のおきて
